EmailTemplate.name: Data Services - Received Your Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Data Services - Data Services Received Your Voicemail or Email
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Data Services Received Your Voicemail or Email {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Contact.Name},
[Template 1 - Received Audix]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- You sent us an email on [DATE], regarding {!Case.CaseNumber}. We have assigned your message to the agent working on your case. We always try to contact you as soon as possible, but we may be working with another customer.
The expected turnaround time of callback from Data Services is 2 Business hours.
Looking for Status Update?
We recommend visiting the Data Services Case Status Information page. You will need the information you received from your Welcome email with "SBG Data Services" in the subject line. It contains the information you'll need to log in and see where your case is at in the recovery process.
You also can leave a message directly to the specialist working on your case or provide additional information.
We appreciate your time and patience.
Thank you, Intuit Data Services
This is an automated email. Please do not reply directly as you will not receive a response.
